body_html: @jart we should not merge any implementation built on top of atomic TF ops, because its performance would be really bad. We would need to implement the change at the level of the pooling ops in C++/CUDA. I think this could be a worthwhile change, if we find someone who is interested in working on it, although there is little data to confirm this.

body: @jart we should not merge any implementation built on top of atomic TF ops, because its performance would be really bad. We would need to implement the change at the level of the pooling ops in C++/CUDA. I think this *could* be a worthwhile change, if we find someone who is interested in working on it, although there is little data to confirm this.
